audio_description: This is a bit easier than the biriyani we make in Kannur. It's easier to prepare. This isn’t made with ghee rice. It’s made using water and rice. Basmati rice is used here. In Kannur biriyani, regular rice is used. That’s the difference. Let's see how to make Hyderabadi Chicken Dum Biriyani at home.

audio_description: For making biriyani, I’ve taken basmati rice here. This brand is called Davat. I mostly use it when I’m in Abu Dhabi. I’m in Abu Dhabi now, so I always buy this rice here. It’s a good rice. When you cook it, the grains won’t stick to each other. It's a long grain and very good. So, if you get it, try buying this brand.
